about_the_game:
Happy Halloween! This set contains all costumes in the Halloween 2016 set.
This set contains one costume each for 35 characters.

This set contains costumes for the following characters:
Kasumi, Ayane, Ryu Hayabusa, Hayate, Kokoro, Hitomi, Leifang, Tina, La Mariposa, Helena, Christie, Mila, Sarah, Pai, Momiji, Rachel, Alpha-152, Jann Lee, Zack, Eliot, Brad Wong, Bayman, Rig, Bass, Gen Fu, Akira, Ein, Leon, Jacky, Marie Rose, Phase 4, Nyotengu, Honoka, Raidou, and Naotora Ii.

*You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content.
detailed_description:
NOTICE

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.


About the Game

Happy Halloween! This set contains all costumes in the Halloween 2016 set. This set contains one costume each for 35 characters. This set contains costumes for the following characters: Kasumi, Ayane, Ryu Hayabusa, Hayate, Kokoro, Hitomi, Leifang, Tina, La Mariposa, Helena, Christie, Mila, Sarah, Pai, Momiji, Rachel, Alpha-152, Jann Lee, Zack, Eliot, Brad Wong, Bayman, Rig, Bass, Gen Fu, Akira, Ein, Leon, Jacky, Marie Rose, Phase 4, Nyotengu, Honoka, Raidou, and Naotora Ii. *You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 870 over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280×720 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 2600 over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920×1080 pixel over True Color ※4K Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over

oflc.descriptors: Violence, sexualised imagery and nudity, online interactivity

pegi.descriptors: Violence, sexual and online gameplay with other people.
